summary: Consume HighLevel API v1 for managing contacts, opportunities, and tasks.

parameters.name: resource
parameters.description: Select the type of resource to interact with (e.g., Contact, Opportunity, Task).

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Choose the operation to perform on the selected resource (e.g., Create, Delete, Get, Update).

parameters.name: contactCreateNotice
parameters.description: A notice displayed when creating a new contact or updating an existing one.

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: Email address required to create a contact.
